API reference

The current version of the API is 3. It has a smaller API interface than v3 for the bundle endpoints, uses a new build system for creating the bundles, and installs the components from npm instead of from Bower.

GET /v3/bundles/js

Fetch a set of modules and build a JavaScript bundle.

Param Where? Description
modules Querystring A comma separated list of modules in the form module@version. module is the name of the module on the npm registry version will be interpreted using SemVer rules and the best matching version will be built.
system_code Querystring The bizops system code for the system which is making the build service request.
callback Querystring (Optional) If present, calls the named javascript function on the window object once the bundle is loaded, with the modules object as the first argument.

Due to the expected long duration of the build process, this method may return a redirect to keep the connection alive while the build continues in the background.

The following HTTP errors can be returned:

  • 400 Bad Request: The request was invalid
  • 409 Conflict: There was a dependency conflict in the bundle of modules specified
  • 500 Internal Server Error: There was a server error with the build service
  • 560 Compilation Error (non-standard): There was an error compiling the module code, reported from the build tools. This is likely an issue with the module, not with the build service itself

GET /v3/bundles/css

Fetch a set of modules and build a CSS bundle.

Param Where Description
modules Querystring A comma separated list of modules in the form module@version. module is the name of the module on the npm registry version will be interpreted using SemVer rules and the best matching version will be built.
brand Querystring The brand to compile the CSS for. Can be one of master, internal, or whitelabel
system_code Querystring The bizops system code for the system which is making the build service request.

Due to the expected long duration of the build process, this method may return a redirect to keep the connection alive while the build continues in the background.

The following HTTP errors can be returned:

  • 400 Bad Request: The request was invalid
  • 409 Conflict: There was a dependency conflict in the bundle of modules specified
  • 500 Internal Server Error: There was a server error with the build service
  • 560 Compilation Error (non-standard): There was an error compiling the module code, reported from the build tools. This is likely an issue with the module, not with the build service itself

GET /v3/files

Fetch a specific file from a module.

Param Where Description
module Querystring A module in the form module@version. module is the name of the module on the npm registry version will be interpreted using SemVer rules and the best matching version will be used.
file Querystring The path to the file to have returned.
system_code Querystring The bizops system code for the system which is making the build service request.

Due to the expected long duration of downloading from npm, this method may return a redirect to keep the connection alive while the build continues in the background.

The following HTTP errors can be returned:

  • 400 Bad Request: The request was invalid
  • 500 Internal Server Error: There was a server error with the build service
